Errors.ShortMessage: Only Good 'Til Cancelled duration is supported for fixed price listings.
Errors.LongMessage: To help you sell your item, fixed price listings can only be listed with a Good 'Til Cancelled duration. The listing duration has been set to Good 'Til Cancelled.

Errors.ShortMessage: You need to create a seller's account.
Errors.LongMessage: Before you can list this item we need some additional information to create a seller's account.
